Belthassan looked at the cat, almost showing empathy.

Belthassan: First, I must tell you that restoring your old form can't
be done and would be utterly useless. That technology has been
obsolete for a long time and can't be replicated. Also, your actual
mode seems much more performing than your previous one, whatever it
was. Now as for who we Tripredacus are...

He went over to an old pipe and sat there.

Belthassan: We are descendants from a great Transformer who diverged
from the Autobot ranks and went underground. No archives have been
preserved of him. He established his faction and the millenias made us
evolve to what we are today. Right now, we are busy pacifying
Cybertron from our recent conquest of it. We drove off the main forces
of Maximals and the few Predacons who did not cooperate. They are
respectively the descendants of the Autobots and Decepticons. In other
words... (he glared at her) we are the masters of Cybertron!
